data.name: RushOut
data.detailed_description:
RushOut is a hilarious mix of platformers and third-person shooters, where every feature is taken to the extreme, from C4-strapped pigs and zombie wizards as enemies, to burgers, pizzas, and lollipops as traps, all working towards the same goal—sending you back to the start of the level and making you cry. Having been thrown into a boundless dream world full of weird platforms, devastating traps, and crazed enemies, you must escape, find out who brought you here, and uhh... not-alive them.



Use your smarts and abuse the ragdoll mechanics to finish each level, or just be extremely lucky and get flung across the whole map by a stray chicken or one of other crazy obstacles we have in store for you.



Stockpile powerful weapons and use them to blast hordes of annoying foes who are trying to stop you, or shoot your way through any obstacles you come across!


This game was made to test the limits of human frustration, so don’t get discouraged if you can’t beat the game today, or tomorrow, or the day after that! It’s a feature, not a bug, we promise!
data.about_the_game:

Having been thrown into a boundless dream world full of weird platforms, devastating traps, and crazed enemies, you must escape, find out who brought you here, and uhh... not-alive them.



Use your smarts and abuse the ragdoll mechanics to finish each level, or just be extremely lucky and get flung across the whole map by a stray chicken or one of other crazy obstacles we have in store for you.



Stockpile powerful weapons and use them to blast hordes of annoying foes who are trying to stop you, or shoot your way through any obstacles you come across!


This game was made to test the limits of human frustration, so don’t get discouraged if you can’t beat the game today, or tomorrow, or the day after that! It’s a feature, not a bug, we promise!
data.short_description: RushOut is a wacky ragdoll crash course that’s filled to the brim with addictive platforming puzzles, high-powered weapons, zombie wizards, and C4-strapped pigs. Sprint through exhilarating obstacles and shoot your way through hordes of goofy enemies all the way to victory!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
